roleset.name: baseless, without grounds, unsupported
roleset.note: UNFOUNDED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from unfounded.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: in that case , the discourse of the Democratic Progressive Party that " Taiwan is the Republic of China and the Republic of China is Taiwan " will be legally unfounded .
example.arg: the discourse of the Democratic Progressive Party that " Taiwan is the Republic of China and the Republic of China is Taiwan
